desc: Art & Flowers Flowers for Weddings & Special Events. Host an Art Party @ your place for birthdays, girls night out or team building events. Original artwork and Fine Art Reproductions

layout.text: Acrylic Pour Painting with a Mini Kitchen Strainer /Black & White Granite
I'm so excited to teach this class on how to use a kitchen strainer and a paint mixture to create some beautiful effects resembling Granite & Marble.
